system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice negation by Advising a friend about dates with 'don't'. I want to ensure that I can form negative imperatives of main verbs with 'don't' + main verb. Clauses: imperatives For example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) have a first date tomorrow and are nervous. Ask me to help you list What not to do. Use short sentences. (e.g. “I’m anxious about the date. What should I not do?”, “This is my first date in years. What shouldn’t I say?”, “Can you tell me What else not to do?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Advising a friend about dates with 'don't', using, for example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: "Hi! I’m really nervous about my date tomorrow. It’s my first date in years. Can you tell me what I shouldn’t do? Like, don’t do what?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Hi! I’m so nervous about my date tomorrow. It’s my first date in years. Can you tell me what I shouldn’t do? Like, don’t do what?"

conversation.content: Hi! Sure, I can help. Don’t be late. Don’t talk only about yourself. Don’t use your phone too much. Don’t forget to be polite.
"Thanks! What else? Don’t do what? Like, don’t say what? Don’t forget what?"
"Sorry, I mean can you tell me more things I shouldn’t do? For example, don’t say what? Don’t forget what? I really want to make a good impression!"
Don’t talk about exes. Don’t forget to listen. Don’t say anything rude. Don’t forget to smile.

"Got it! Don’t talk about exes, don’t forget to listen, don’t say rude things, and don’t forget to smile. Thanks so much for your help! I feel less nervous now. I’ll remember your advice and try to enjoy the date. Wish me luck!"
conversation.advanced_content: "Got it! Don’t talk about exes, don’t forget to listen, don’t say rude things, and don’t forget to smile. Thanks so much for your help! I feel a little less nervous now. I’ll remember your advice and try to enjoy the date. Wish me luck!"

conversation.content: Good luck! Don’t forget to be yourself. Have fun!
"Thanks! Don’t worry, I’ll be myself and have fun. Good job! You’ve completed the task. Talk to you later!"
